children.subject:
Best suggestion, check the CLASS NOTES for each of those classes at classes.berkeley.edu. 

I know the faculty for CS 170 just allowed time conflicts last week but they have some requirements about attendance the first week that you should read.
Can I ask about 188 and 170 as well? Thank you.

history.content:
I just received word from the professors that they are now willing to allow time conflicts for CS 186 since it seems that the conflict for finals may well be resolved. (Enrolled and wait listed students will receive a confirmation once that information is finalized.)

Please be aware that faculty is never OBLIGATED to accommodate time conflicts, including conflicting finals. It is the student's responsibility to ensure that they can make it to their scheduled finals or that faculty for one class is willing to make accommodations. Regarding this class, if you decide to enroll with a time conflict, be sure to check back BEFORE the add/drop deadline to make sure you can attend any/all final exams.
history.subject: F20: CS 186 will now allow time conflicts
